website_summaries.verdict: Decent performance for the money on these adjustable skates, which can be used for either kids or women.
pros: These roller blades can adjust to fit
Great for girls in women's sizes who are still growing
Nice wheels and a good look on this skate make for an excellent value
cons: Users seem to have some problems with the shoe inserts
It does not adjust like the rest of the skate

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I'm an adult woman 5'5 - 120lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I'm an adult woman 5'5 - 120lbs and these were perfect to keep up with my husband while he runs. Love that these are expandable so if my sister or mom comes to town they could wear in their size too!
customer_reviews.author: Casey L.

customer_reviews.title: She destroys everything and they seem to holding up pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter. She really enjoys them and didn't have any trouble working the tabs to open or tighten them. Only problem she had was the tounge comes out all the way and had a hard time placing it in the boot while strapping in. I think she's gotten the hang of it though. She destroys everything and they seem to holding up pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Lauren MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Nailed it!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them! She wears a size 9 women's and we ordered the larger skate. I was expecting it to be too big, but fits perfectly! She doesn't complain about blisters like she did with the skating rink roller skates. They seem made very well for adjustable skates.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates replaced some cheaper ones from Wal-mart for my daughter and these are much better quality and she says they feel a lot more comfortable. They are adjustable so I expect them to last a few years. She wears a women's size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy17

customer_reviews.title: wheels break, fall off. don't spin well
customer_reviews.text: I got a few good skates out of these, but: 1. after a while the wheels don't spin well, so you go slower for the same effort. I guess they need to be cleaned and oiled after everyuse. 2. one wheel lost its coating, so didn't turn well on surfaces. 3. later, one wheel fell off, so i'm trying to find a replacement screw. I know these are low end blades, but $50 is not small change to me. These should be more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: Good roller blades
customer_reviews.text: I wear a sz 10 in women’s... I ordered the xlarge, it’s adjustable size 9-12, and mine is on the 9, and it’s fits fine...
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: I am an adult, so for me, brake is too low touches ground while skating causing wipe outs
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult and the size is a perfect fit for lady size 7, but for me, the brake is too low, touching the ground while skating causing wipe outs. When I reached out to the Seller, asking advice on how to adjust the brake or remedy the issue that I am having, the Seller never addressed my request. Instead, the Seller just kept saying that the brake was in the proper place, yet never addressed my query as to suggestions on how to remedy the problem, request for guidance. My neighbor remedied the problem for me. He raised the brake & shave 1/8 inch off of brake, so no more wipe outs.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Princess

customer_reviews.title: Soft boot is not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy. The actual soft boot inside is too small and is not adjustable which is a huge flaw. I wear a size 8 or 8 1/2 in sneakers and the boot is too small. However, the hard part of the boot is adjustable. I bought my son a pair of men's adjustable rollerblades and everything was adjustable as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This skate has a plastic brake that has worn out after only a few skates. After searching extensively, I have not been able to find any replacement for this type of brake. If you plan on using the brake, definitely don’t waste your money on this skate.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful skate
customer_reviews.text: I am returning these skates ONLY because my heel slips and I think its because I have a wide foot. The left skate wheels seemed a little off, but other than that, I would recommend these for anyone. I am a 9.5 shoe (usually in wide) and the fit length wise is fine. I gave a 5 star rating even though I am returning, because I believe it was my foot, not necessarily the skate. I would still recommend someone buy these. The quality is great and they are built really well. I received the box of the skate torn, probably while packing but it did not affect the skate.
customer_reviews.author: Army Nurse

customer_reviews.title: They are still a good product and I'm sure my daughter will enjoy using ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my daughter from her great-grandparents. I have to help her put them on every time she wants to wear them. The latch in the front that is used to tighten the skate is a little difficult. They are still a good product and I'm sure my daughter will enjoy using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! My 10 yo daughter wears a woman's 5/6 in shoes and these fit perfectly! I love that they will change sizes as she grows. The pattern on the fabric is really cool too. She blades outside and these seem to roll very smooth. The tongue for the boot is a little weird and takes getting used to, but overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MORGAN ELLIS

customer_reviews.title: Good product but faults
customer_reviews.text: So the blades are Meade pretty well. Nice smooth wheel, you can go fast with little effort. But these hurt my feet so bad. They fit me but the way the boot it designed the plastic digs into my foot when it’s tightened. Also I can’t tighten the top one as tight as I need it because it just pops open so my ankles move around too much because it’s loose. My feet go to sleep in these. Maybe would be better if I had bought a size bigger than what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: There is no way I could ever get these on my feet. I don't know if it's because of the plastic casing or what, but I bought a size up from my shoe size and I can barely get my (small) hand inside. Nowhere near wide enough to even get the ball of my foot inside, just way too narrow. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: kittybot

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool! I’ve been wanting to get back in touch with my rollerblading skills from when I was 10 years old— the quarantine makes you so weird things. I’d suggest getting the bigger size than you think. I wear a women’s size 9 and the largest size fits great- I still had to expand the toe a bit because it was hitting my ankle in a weird place. I’d suggest using some insoles or something with these bc they aren’t the most comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MCG

customer_reviews.title: Having a blast
customer_reviews.text: My feet hurt on the bottom but I am new to rollerblading and I am not sure if that's the skates fault. Overall I am enjoying myself at the park with these and feel like these got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely tight! If you have a wide foot I would not recommend. My friend ordered these as well and we are both returning. I tried stretching them out but they made my feet extremely sore. Like they literally ached for 30 mins after I took them off.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Want blisters after 1 wear?
customer_reviews.text: I know there are $35 but they are such awful quality, I wish I would have paid $20 extra for some good ones. They gave me blisters on the side and on the heel after 30min of wear
customer_reviews.author: adi16

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for Adults
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend these for adults. I ordered the blue in XL, I wear a size 10 in women’s. These rollerblades were too big and very tight on the ankles even when it wasn’t fastened. It didn’t seem like the lining was adjustable. In my opinion the lining appeared to be maybe a men’s size 10. Nice wheels and nice looking but do yourself a favor and buy a more expensive rollerblade. I will have to send these back.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Stunt wheels
customer_reviews.text: After lots of use for almost 2 months they still look like new except for the break. That’s worn down about halfway. I hope there’s a replacement when it gets any lower. The size seems to be close to shoe size. My son wears eight sneakers. We dialed in size 8 and that works well. Also I’m glad there’s room to expand it to size 9 later.
customer_reviews.author: Brandywine Jim

customer_reviews.title: They seemed really sturdy. Couldn’t complain about that at all
customer_reviews.text: They seemed really sturdy. Couldn’t complain about that at all. However my husband wears a size 12 shoe and these were way to tight for his foot. So we sent them back. If your foot is not at the end of the size range I would definitely go for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rose2675

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issues, unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for my 13 year old who wears size 6 to 6.5 shoes. The sizing on the skates indicate extension up to size 9. We extended them fully trying to find a comfortable fit for him but his toes were at the front edge of the skates and the toe area was also too narrow. We returned them today and will try to find something with a better fit. The quality seemed nice and sturdy, especially for the price, but they need to fit as advertised or the quality becomes irrelevant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I hadn’t skated in over 20 years and ordered 2 different pairs, these adjustable ones and the Bladerunner by Rollerblade Advantage Pro XT Men’s Adult Fitness In-line Skates. These skates are ok, they cost less but I didn’t feel very stable in them. The are a little uncomfortable in the front, so I wouldn’t buy these again. I would pay more for the bladerunner skates they fit better and are a lot more stable than these.
customer_reviews.author: adriana

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: This is how the box is shipped, there really cute. They're not really comfortable the padding of the skate on the top doesn't tuck in like normal. I bought these to teach my daughter how to skate. I wear a size 7/5 to a 8 she wears a 5,6, this is to give you a idea of what size to get we bought large.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Run Small!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a size 2 shoe so I bought her the size 2-5 rollerblades so she'll get a lot of life out of them. When she first put them on, she said they were too small. After trying them out, she said they'll be ok but it's clear that when her foot grows even a little bit, they'll be too small. Besides that, the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a Christmas gift it was in perfect condition and it works well ,easy to put on an take off. My daughter loves it and it is very comfortable. I will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect... The size Small fit my 7-year-old granddaughter perfectly, normally wears size 13... Clamped in nice and snug - great ankle support - Very easy adjustable straps - wheels roll smoothly - brake works well... Was worried, but turned out to be a great purchase... Smiling little girl was the result...
customer_reviews.author: bbb lee

customer_reviews.title: just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. Good quality, nice looks. Size chart was accurate.. Work really well. They are fast and size adjustment is really good. My daughter loved it and started using it the moment we unboxed those. Got exactly what we were expecting. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aki

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7.5 in woman and I bought these in a large and they fit perfectly! The size is adjustable too so I thought that was cool! So far they’re pretty sturdy and fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyC

customer_reviews.title: inline skates
customer_reviews.text: they are made of cheap material, but hopefully they will last . i kind of expected they would be a little more sturdy, kids are hard on thier footwear,other than that i am very happy ,you got them to me in time for his birthday. i can't thank you enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skates perform better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This skates performed better than I expected! I am a 28 year old petite woman and consider myself quite sporty, so truly enjoyed this in-line skates! The only reason why I didnt give it 5 stars is simply because I'm not a kid anymore, and the designs are kid-looking, I wish they had more choices for adult petite women, but other than that they worked just fine! I've fallen a couple of times because this things do go fast haha. Btw you can adjust the size which I thought was pretty cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Poema Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice but small!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed decent for the price but do not fit the stated size range, the L is supposed to fit 6-9 but were too small even at the largest setting for my son's size 7 foot. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine R.

customer_reviews.title: The skates are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates because they are adjustable and they fit very comfortable. I had a problem with one of the skate because the snap wouldn't stay close I reported the problem and bang... they sent another one within days no questions asked. You would love these skates, I ordered another pair for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: john harris

customer_reviews.title: great rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old son loves these! He has an extra wide foot so I bought them a little bigger and they fit great! Now that all my kids have rollerblades, I can't stop them from rollerblading daily :) It's just so much fun for them. They rollerblade in the house, outside on sidewalks, parks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: savi

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges on the plastic in the center
customer_reviews.text: Just got them for my 12 girl. Wears 9.5 women. Slender feet length plenty of room. The plactic around has a very sharp edge. I got cut on my hand. The tongue insert is hard to stuff back in. So I am returning. Minus 2 stars. One for being sharp and the other tongue material not being able to put its right .spot
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: one of the screw holding the wheel came off the second day into using them. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hara

customer_reviews.title: very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed as they are very narrow and hurt to get them on. Where the straps are pushed hard into my ankles. Also; when I got them I did not initially notice the face they had been well used! The wheels are all scuffed up and the brake is noticeably worn. Preposterous to send a customer used and worn skates!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: tongue on the wrong side
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 7-7.5, these fit perfectly at a 6. My compliment is that the tongue is place on the out side of the liner instead of the in side, so it is frustrating to keep tucked in, while tighten the stap.
customer_reviews.author: Amiela Smith

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Son and daughter loves the skates. Since this scam of a virus hit they have been skating almost everyday and they work perfect. The only problem is the wheels I have to buy news ones and it is a little hard to fine in my area, but that is what the internet is for.
customer_reviews.author: missmary09

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect.. Look amazing
customer_reviews.text: These Rollerblades are just as pictured.. My Granddaughter wears a size 5 shoe .. We purchased the Medium size .. They fit perfect.. Look amazing. She just loves them.. Packaging and delivery were awesome as always.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Greene

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Wheels = Great Grip! Fits 10yo perfectly. Easy to tighten & adjust.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SKATES! These fit my 10-year-old beautifully. She loves that they’re comfortable, easy to adjust and tighten and are bold colors. Her favorite part is the rubber wheels that give her grip on both the sidewalk and the roller rink.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja

customer_reviews.title: Great but worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Rollerblades are great. They did lead to a broken finger but that’s operated error. They fit nicely and are comfortable. My child wears them for hours at a time with no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney G

customer_reviews.title: Great little rollerblades for the beginning skater - fit was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little rollerblades for the beginning skater - fit was as expected but I don't think it would hurt to buy one size up and have your child wear heavier socks if you wanted. They fit, but were snug.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.  Dont support ankles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, he has used them 2 times, they have terrible support feet bow in like he is going to break an ankle. I wished I could return, but I bought them for Christmas and he just used them now its warm. Not worth the money and they adjust but they dont fit correct when adjusted. Not happy dont buy. Look for a more traditional online skate with rope laces and clips for support.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty angel

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: The skates adjust very easily and they arrived sooner than I expected. My only issue is the sole of the right skate is wrinkled and sticks up making it uncomfortable. Besides that they rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: We could not get the tongue to go inside the skates. It was a worse design than other skates we have used. Ended up returning and purchasing a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son won't take them off. He is size 6 and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: John R Clark

customer_reviews.title: Only for NARROW feet
customer_reviews.text: These left bruises on my feet after one use. I wear a size 6/12 women’s. I got the extra large. The adjustable feature is awesome if they are comfortable for you. I gifted them to a friend who wears a size 8 and has very narrow feet-they are comfortable for her. I went with $80 k2 brand from play it again sports and they are 10x more comfortable. My husband got a pair of k2s as well.
customer_reviews.author: Truss

customer_reviews.title: Shoe tongue should be made wider
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The only problem is the shoe tongue is too narrow. You spend way too much time just trying to put that tongue inside.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional shopper

customer_reviews.title: No ankle support
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. These rollerblades are on the cheaper end, but get the job done. The ankle support is really lacking so I have to wrap my ankles before heading out with the kids. The tongue also fits weird, I'm not sure how to describe it other than weird. Personally I wouldn't purchase these again, the extra $30 or so it would have been for a better quality is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fast
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves these skates. They are comfortable and the wheels work better than previous skates she's had; her speed is better. However, after one use, the loop on one skate came apart and makes it harder to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great price. Bought 2 sets one for my son and one for daughter. Love the adjustable shoe size. These will fit my kids for awhile
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: These are nice skates. I bought them for my grandson who ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice skates. I bought them for my grandson who has used them on the street and in the roller rink. The are adjustable to size and fit well. So far that are holding up well and he has used them quite often.
customer_reviews.author: PJarc

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These really are uncomfortable. My kids still use them but not for very long as they hurt. ok price. Will spend more for better quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I love these skates. I am 28 and I purchased size Large which is 6-9, I adjusted them to my size with no problem. I find them to be very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable & a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to get one wear out of these because I broke my ankle doing another activity (hiking) but even know it was one time it quickly reminded me how much more practice I need with them because I have only roller skates and these kinda felt like I was on ice skates even know I never ice skated but I imagine that is how ice skates would feel...lol...I can't wait to try them again
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Silva

customer_reviews.title: Why hasn't anybody thought about this sooner???
customer_reviews.text: The perfection solution for feet that grow fast. My daughter loves them - adjusting the size is super easy and takes 5 seconds. My hasn't anybody thought about this sooner??? We wasted so much money on 'fixed size' roller skates for the past 6 years.......
customer_reviews.author: deutscherhififan

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: When my granddaughter saw theses skates she was over the moon! She skated up and down the street avoiding ice and snow until she froze!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! I love taking my kids out for walks while they ride their scooters. I thought these would be a fun way to keep up with them and get exercise. It has been such a great workout. I've been using them for a couple of weeks now. The first few times wearing them they were a bit uncomfortable on the arch of my foot and ankle. Now that they are broken in they feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Dilorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Roll too fast for learning
customer_reviews.text: They’re sized for children and the design is nice; however, I don’t believe they were designed with children in mind. The wheels roll way to fast. I suppose I should’ve looked at the ABAC number before I purchased. My seven year old is frustrated with them- they are not a learning skate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing
customer_reviews.text: Box came broken. Giving as a gift, so that wasn't helpful. A pain to have return. Buying brand new should come looking used.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Elwart

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible the clips for one do not go all the way through to go tight enough. They don’t stay latched down either. These are terrible for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Curley

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: These really pinch your ankles and they sent one skate with one brake and the other didn’t have one. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first pair of inline skates
customer_reviews.text: Great first pair of inline skates. Sturdy and comfortable..from what I can tell by the hours and hours she wears:) Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brooke V

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable but not veey comfortable. Very hard inside and the padding moves around
customer_reviews.author: Wianca

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 11 year old daughter and they’re perfect. She is a woman’s size 8 and there is plenty of room in the XL size. At first, they bothered her ankle, but are breaking in. She uses them every day.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates, well built
customer_reviews.text: So far they are really nice skate. They are well built and constructed. We just need to wait for summer to come back around to really see how well they work.
customer_reviews.author: Greatness

customer_reviews.title: Would be better with laces in addition to the two buckles
customer_reviews.text: The ankles are very flexible going forward, making these a bit hard for a beginner. Took some BIG falls in these because the ankles are so unsupportive and it is hard to get the fit right. Would be better with laces in addition to the two buckles.
customer_reviews.author: fantasy reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but too small for my daughter but that wasn’t the product’s fault. They are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica MB

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These are highly uncomfortable. And the balance is off making skating highly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 yr old daughter, she loves them and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great blades, runs large
customer_reviews.text: Runs large! Daughter loves them. They roll very well, are comfy, and have "cushioned wheels" (softer rubber) which makes for a smoother ride. The colors are nice and vibrant, too.
customer_reviews.author: LN6

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great they came as promised, and are comfortable and as per the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Seyah

customer_reviews.title: Great roller blades
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She loves them. They fit well and seen very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Chaney

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and fit fine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter who is 9 and wears a size 7 women's shoe. She has already worn them skating twice and she loves them. They are comfortable and fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.Wash

customer_reviews.title: THEY HURT
customer_reviews.text: To easy to hurt your ankles uncomfortable hurts your feet waisted money on this would have picked 0 star
customer_reviews.author: Jerramia

customer_reviews.title: unsecured buckle
customer_reviews.text: These skates are adorable and look just like the picture. They are overall decent quality, just one of the top buckles on the skates does not stay closed. I bought these for my daughter and it's frustrating because without the buckle closing properly, she could hurt herself.
customer_reviews.author: Alee gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good skate for kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved them and they were true to size for him. Adjusted wheels and they roll great
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 9 year old daughter who wears a size 7. She loves them. I wear a size 9 and I also tried them on. They fit perfectly. For some reason she thinks I will try to use her skates lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skating fun
customer_reviews.text: Not the best long lasting skate but good for kids still growing
customer_reviews.author: Iliah

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old daughters favorite present! She loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughters favorite present! She loves them. Super easy to adjust great quality and she is starting to figure them out! these are so cute! I love that they will grow with her
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our daughter for her 9th bday. She has been riding around the neighborhood every day. She loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: colorado

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but narrow - uncomfortable on ankles
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but the plastic around the ankles is uncomfortable. Still waiting to be refunded on our return.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are a little hard for my son to put on (and he plays ice hockey, so he is used to skates)
customer_reviews.author: Jimena Igarzabal

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and returned them a day after receiving them. They just weren’t comfortable at all. The hard part is adjustable as they advertised but the inside is just way to narrow and extremely hard. The moment i tried them on i just knew i couldn’t keep them. Which sucked because they were decent in price and my favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: On top of that the most painful roller blade I have ever put on
customer_reviews.text: The plastic part is adjustable in size but the inside mesh boot is not. On top of that the most painful roller blade I have ever put on. Absolutely no arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great roller blades
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Package great and well made. Daughter truly loves them
customer_reviews.author: Poohlife

customer_reviews.title: My.son loves these
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, the great thing about is you can adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Ching Saetern

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift. When she gets these I'll come and leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: FreaknCrazybobs' Playlists

customer_reviews.title: Cheap- not for adults
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where all the good reviews came from. These are horrible. Very cheaply made and provide no stability. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Tnb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 8 years old boy is so amazed by these as he had couple other ones that he said weren’t as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: walim

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable, couldn’t wear for longer than 10 minutes without terrible foot and ankle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea rhoades

customer_reviews.title: These were for a grandson. I'm assured he likes ...
customer_reviews.text: These were for a grandson. I'm assured he likes them very much and has gotten much use from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dian

customer_reviews.title: Tight on ankles
customer_reviews.text: Very tight on my ankles. Not great for extended wear. There is a pinch point with the plastic and not enough padding to make them wearable for more than 30 minutes. Very cute tho. Wish they worked better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bhappy99

customer_reviews.title: My daughter (age 6) wears a 12-1 size shoe depending ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (age 6) wears a 12-1 size shoe depending on where they're bought. I ordered the 12-1 roller blade and she can not wear them because they are too small. They do expand but she says the insert is to tight. :(
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute color and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she is a 10 in womens shoes. She states they are comfortable. We've had them for 2 weeks no issues with wheels or overall product. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: katlynn20

customer_reviews.title: My feet hurt but it’s my fault
customer_reviews.text: No very comfortable but they work. I have fat feet tho
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherRG

customer_reviews.title: What's with the wheels??
customer_reviews.text: The roller blades' wheels are not smooth. They don't roll all that well.
customer_reviews.author: # 1 Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but cheap.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. They do what they’re supposed to, but they are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun. They fit well. Are easy to adjust. I haven’t been on rollerblades in over 15 years so I wasn’t about to shovel out $100+ to start up again just for fun here and there. Really good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kahla M.

product_meta.title: High Bounce Adjustable Inline Skate
feature_bullets: Super smooth Gel Wheels. Soft Comfort Shoe. EZ Carry Loop
Simple Buckle. No Laces to tie.
Adjustable Sizing via press of a button: Small 12-1 ABEC 5, Medium 2-5 ABEC 5, Large 6-9 ABEC 7
Comes Packaged in a beautiful color box. Makes an amazing gift
